table_of_contents.title: Migrants and markets : perspectives from economics and the other social sciences / Holger Kolb and Henrik Egbert

subtitle: perspectives from economics and the other social sciences
title: Migrants and markets
subjects: Emigration and immigration -- Economic aspects -- Congresses

by_statement: edited by Holger Kolb and Henrik Egbert.

notes.value:
Papers from the conference "Work, entrepreneurship and economic integration: migration research in economics and the other social sciences" held at the Institute for Migration Research and Intercultural Studies at the University of Osnabrück on 28-29 January 2006.

Includes bibliographical references.
